name: Asprey Bugatti La Voiture Noire Collection

metadata.description: The first Asprey Bugatti Collection: The La Voiture Noire. 261 sculptures made at Asprey's London workshop linked with NFT artwork. Each NFT has the brand colours of Bugatti and Asprey reflecting centuries of heritage and celebrating the future of this incredible partnership. Each NFT has a redeemable sculpture. For more information visit aspreybugatti.com
